base_description: White, round vase with a flat lid.
part_description: Includes a round body, a narrow neck, and a flat, circular lid. The body is bulbous and smooth, tapering towards the neck, which supports the lid.
internal_interaction_description: The lid rests securely on the narrow neck of the vase, providing a seal that can keep contents inside. The bulbous body allows for ample storage space within, while the narrow neck supports structural integrity and balance.
external_interaction_description: The vase can be placed on flat surfaces and used to hold flowers or other decorative items. Its smooth surface and neutral color allow it to blend with various interior designs, while the lid can keep contents protected from dust or external elements.
